Package br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util

Class ActionFormValidationMessageUtil

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util.ActionFormValidationMessageUtil
public class ActionFormValidationMessageUtil extends Object
Class responsible to manipulate validation messages.
Since:

  • Method Details

    • createContentTypeValidationMessage

      public static ValidationActionFormMessage createContentTypeValidationMessage(String propertyName, String propertyLabel, ContentType propertyContentType, ContentType[] propertyContentTypes)
      Creates a content type validation message.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyLabel - String that contains the propertyLabel of the property.
      propertyContentType - Instance that contains the content type of the property.
      propertyContentTypes - Array that contains the permitted content types.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the validation message.

    • createContentSizeValidationMessage

      public static ValidationActionFormMessage createContentSizeValidationMessage(String propertyName, String propertyLabel, double propertyContentSize, ByteMetricType propertyContentSizeUnit)
      Creates a content size validation message.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyLabel - String that contains the propertyLabel of the property.
      propertyContentSize - Numeric value that contains the size.
      propertyContentSizeUnit - Instance that contains the size unit.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the validation message.

    • createRequiredValidationMessage

      public static ValidationActionFormMessage createRequiredValidationMessage(String propertyName, String propertyLabel)

      Parameters:
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyLabel - String that contains the propertyLabel of the property.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the validation message.

      Creates a comparison validation message.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyLabel - String that contains the propertyLabel of the property.
      propertyCompareCondition - Instance that contains the comparison type.
      comparePropertyName - String that contains the identifier of the comparison property.
      propertyCompareLabel - String that contains the propertyLabel of the comparison property.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the validation message.

      public static ValidationActionFormMessage createRangeValidationMessage(String propertyName, String propertyLabel, Object minimumValue, Object maximumValue)
      Creates a numeric range validation message.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyLabel - String that contains the propertyLabel of the property.
      minimumValue - Numeric value that contains the start range.
      maximumValue - Numeric value that contains the end range.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the validation message.

      Creates a custom validation message.
      Parameters:
      validation - String that contains the identifier of the custom message.
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyLabel - String that contains the propertyLabel of the property.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the validation message.
